annotations.description: VA-11 HALL-A is a "Cyberpunk Bartending Action" game and today I'm recreating 3 of the drinks that appear in the game. Grab your mirror shades, we're off to ...
annotations.title: Drinks from Va-11 Hall-A | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lime Juice
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. orgeat
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Grenadine
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Passo√£ (Passion fruit liqueur)
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Plantation 5 Year (Aged rum)
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Smith + Cross (Jamaican rum)
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Lemon Hart 151 (Overproof rum)

Shake & Serve over crushed ice
Garnish with flaming lime boat

title: Flaming Moai
